document_data.name: Benjamin Carrathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Benjamin Carrathal''' was High King of [[Callidyrr]] in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} Like his predecessors, although he held the title of High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]], he was considered to be merely a figurehead by the [[Ffolk]] outside of Callidyrr.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Carrathal Dynasty]] and was the first son of his predecessor, [[Rieger Carrathal|King Rieger]]. His eventual successor was his own first son, [[Alec Carrathal IV]].
